en.title: Volunteer
en.text1: NNK offers in-field internships by providing free accommodation, partial allowance, legal services and psychological support for a real humanitarian experience. Conditions might be stressful and the work requires emotional maturity and responsibility. If you feel ready to join, please check the requirements and fill the form.

messageSent.title: You message has been sent
messageSent.msgSent:
Thank you for writing us.
We'll contact you as soon as possible.

es.title: Voluntariado
es.text1: NNK ofrece períodos de voluntariado y prácticas en terreno incluyendo alojamiento gratuito, manutención parcial, servicios legales y apoyo psicológico, para una experiencia humanitaria auténtica. Las condiciones de trabajo pueden resultar estresantes y requieren un alto grado de responsabilidad y madurez emocional. Si tienes ganas de unirte al equipo, comprueba los requisitos y rellena el formulario.

messageSent.title: You message has been sent
messageSent.msgSent:
Thank you for writing us.
We'll contact you as soon as possible.
